alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 3:04AM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with higher amounts above 6500 feet. Winds gusting over 30 mph at times. Gusts up to 50 mph are possible across higher elevations of the South Hills and Albion Mountains. * WHERE...The South Hills, Albion Mountains, Marsh and Arbon Highlands, and Bear River Range. This includes Highway 36 over Emigration Summit. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Pockets of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
